Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱりヘンだぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, there's something strange going on...

Entry.JapaneseText: これだけ大勢の人が 異変を感じている以上、 気のせいとは言えないな。
Entry.EnglishText: So many people have noted weird things going on, and they can't all be imagining it.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、声だったり物音だったり、 一体、何が原因なんでしょう……
Entry.EnglishText: But what on earth could be causing the noises or voices...?

Entry.JapaneseText: それはわからないが…… みんなの話を聞いてみて ひとつ気になった事がある。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no clue, but...when we were talking to everyone, there was something that stuck out to me...

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、何だそりゃ？
Entry.EnglishText: Which was?

Entry.JapaneseText: それは……
Entry.EnglishText: That would be...

Entry.JapaneseText: 優しい工場長 恨みを持った人物 怪しい場所 仕事サボリの新入り
Entry.EnglishText: Kind Boss Someone with a grudge The suspicious location The new hire being a slacker

Entry.JapaneseText: 優しい工場長…… あの人の態度が妙な気が……
Entry.EnglishText: The factory manager being kind... Something about that behavior seems weird to me...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか？ ああ見えても 工場長は小心者だけど、 悪い人じゃないんだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: You think so? He's a coward, but he's not a bad guy by any means.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうですよ。 何も言わずに<Tytree>さんを 雇ってくれる人なんですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>'s right. He hired <Tytree> without a fuss, after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……それもそうだな。 他にも気になる事がある。 それは……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... I guess you're right. There's something else that was bothering me. Which was...

Entry.JapaneseText: 恨みを持った人物…… 工場の人たちが言っていた 「怨念」……
Entry.EnglishText: The person holding a grudge... The factory workers were talking about a "vengeful spirit"...

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なにを言ってるんですか！ 「怨念」だなんて、そんなもの 小説の中だけの話ですよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What are you insinuating?! Vengeful spirits only exist in fiction!

Entry.JapaneseText: 「怨念」があるかどうかは別として、 この工場では、今までに一度も 人が亡くなるような事故はなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: Even if ghosts did exist, no one's ever died in this factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場を恨むような人も いるとは思えないぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: So I don't think there's anyone holding a grudge towards this place.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……だとしたら、 他に気になるのは……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... Well, there's something else that's piqued my interest...

Entry.JapaneseText: 怪しい場所だ……
Entry.EnglishText: The suspicious location...

Entry.JapaneseText: 奇妙な事が起きているのは、 全て溶鉱炉のところなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: All of the strange occurrences have been happening around the blast furnace.

Entry.JapaneseText: だとしたら、溶鉱炉の周りを 調べてみるしかないですね！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, if that's so, then we have no choice but to investigate the blast furnace.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、そうだ！ さっそく行って調べようぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, you're right! Let's head on over there!

Entry.JapaneseText: 仕事サボリの新入り…… あいつは……工場に恨みを 持っていないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: The new hire has been slacking off... Perhaps he's the one who has a grudge against the factory?

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな優しくしてたみたいだし、 恨むなんて事はないはずだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: But everyone's been so nice to him, he doesn't have much of a reason to hold a grudge.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……となると、 気になるのは……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... In that case, something else that caught my attention is...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……となると、 デフォルトだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... In that case, the default is...
Entry.Notes: debug/ exception handler string is my assumption

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
